metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title contains "Sr." and required experience is 8-10 years.

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states "Data Engineer" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines.

sub_specialty.evidence: Required skills include Hadoop, Hive, PySpark – technologies typically used for batch ETL workloads.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities; role is described as an independent, hands‑on position.

primary_cloud.evidence: Job description lists only on‑prem Hadoop technologies; no cloud provider is referenced.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No additional cloud platforms are mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Tools such as Hive and PySpark indicate batch processing pipelines.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tool (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) is referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Job mentions Hadoop ecosystem but does not specify warehouse vs. lake storage patterns.

remote_restriction.evidence: Posting states "locals only for onsite" and restricts to GA (Georgia).

relocation_required.evidence: Candidate must already be a local resident; no relocation offer is mentioned.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned; absence suggests it is unlikely to be offered.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility; default assumption is not friendly.

citizenship_required.evidence: Requirement is to be a local resident; does not explicitly demand citizenship, only work authorization.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Position is described as a full‑time onsite role, typical of W‑2 employment.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits array is empty and no perks are listed in the posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Posting does not discuss career progression or growth tracks.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship or coaching programs are referenced.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement paths appears in the description.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting contains no mention of internal transfers or mobility options.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track options (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Must have 8‑10 years experience and specific technologies (Palantir Foundry, Hadoop, Hive, PySpark) with no nice‑to‑have items.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses solely on senior data engineering responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with typical expectations for a senior data engineer with 8‑10 years experience.
